articles.title: People Inc. forges AI licensing deal with Microsoft as Google traffic drops
articles.summary: signs an AI licensing deal with Microsoft, which will use its media content in Copilot.
articles.content: People Inc. signs an AI licensing deal with Microsoft, which will use its media content in Copilot.

articles.title: Rivian creates another spinoff company called Mind Robotics
articles.summary: It's the second time this year Rivian has spun out a new company, after it created micromobility startup Also in March.
articles.content: It's the second time this year Rivian has spun out a new company, after it created micromobility startup Also in March.
articles.author: Sean O'Kane

articles.title: Google’s AI Mode gets new agentic capabilities to help book event tickets and beauty appointments
articles.summary: For example, you can ask "find me 2 cheap tickets for the Shaboozey concert coming up.  prefer standing floor tickets.
articles.content: For example, you can ask "find me 2 cheap tickets for the Shaboozey concert coming up. prefer standing floor tickets." AI Mode will then search across multiple websites to find real-time ticket options that meet your specific requests.
articles.author: Aisha Malik

articles.title: Sora is now available on Android in the US, Canada, and other regions
articles.summary: The Android version of Sora retains all the features of its iOS counterpart, including the “Cameos” feature, which allows users to generate videos of themselves performing various activities using the.
articles.content: The Android version of Sora retains all the features of its iOS counterpart, including the “Cameos” feature, which allows users to generate videos of themselves performing various activities using their own likeness.
articles.author: Lauren Forristal

articles.title: Shopify says AI traffic is up 7x since January, AI-driven orders are up 11x
articles.summary: Shopify is bullish on AI-powered shopping agents, citing AI as an "incredible tool" to enable more entrepreneurs and calling it the "biggest shift in technology since the internet" during its third-qu.
articles.content: Shopify is bullish on AI-powered shopping agents, citing AI as an "incredible tool" to enable more entrepreneurs and calling it the "biggest shift in technology since the internet" during its third-quarter earnings call.
articles.author: Sarah Perez

articles.title: Anthropic projects $70B in revenue by 2028: Report
articles.summary: The Information reports that Anthropic expects to generate as much as $70 billion in revenue and $17 billion in cash flow in 2028.  The growth projections are fueled by rapid adoption of Anthropic’s b.
articles.content: The Information reports that Anthropic expects to generate as much as $70 billion in revenue and $17 billion in cash flow in 2028. The growth projections are fueled by rapid adoption of Anthropic’s business products, a person with knowledge of the company’s financials said.
articles.author: Rebecca Bellan

articles.title: Nvidia, Deutsche Telekom strike €1B partnership for a data center in Munich
articles.summary: Nvidia has signed a €1 billion partnership with Deutsche Telekom to set up an "AI factory" in Munich that aims to boost Germany's AI computing power by 50%.
articles.content: Nvidia has signed a €1 billion partnership with Deutsche Telekom to set up an "AI factory" in Munich that aims to boost Germany's AI computing power by 50%.
articles.author: Ram Iyer

articles.title: Flawed AI benchmarks put enterprise budgets at risk
articles.summary: A new academic review suggests AI benchmarks are flawed, potentially leading an enterprise to make high-stakes decisions on “misleading” data.  Enterprise leaders are committing budgets of.
articles.content: A new academic review suggests AI benchmarks are flawed, potentially leading an enterprise to make high-stakes decisions on “misleading” data. Enterprise leaders are committing budgets of eight or nine figures to generative AI programmes. These procurement and development decisions often
articles.author: Ryan Daws

articles.title: Alexa+ comes to the Amazon Music app
articles.summary: The feature is currently available across all Amazon Music subscription plans but is only available for users with Alexa+ Early Access.
articles.content: The feature is currently available across all Amazon Music subscription plans but is only available for users with Alexa+ Early Access.
articles.author: Lauren Forristal

articles.title: ClickUp adds new AI assistant to better compete with Slack and Notion
articles.summary: ClickUp has been trying to better compete with the likes of Notion, Slack, and Microsoft Teams by providing calendar, communication, documents, enterprise search, and task tracking under one product.
articles.content: ClickUp has been trying to better compete with the likes of Notion, Slack, and Microsoft Teams by providing calendar, communication, documents, enterprise search, and task tracking under one product.
articles.author: Ivan Mehta

articles.title: ClinCheck Live brings AI planning to Invisalign dental treatments
articles.summary: Align Technology, a medical device company that designs, manufactures, and sells the Invisalign system of clear aligners, exocad CAD/CAM software, and iTero intra-oral scanners, has unveiled ClinCheck.
articles.content: Align Technology, a medical device company that designs, manufactures, and sells the Invisalign system of clear aligners, exocad CAD/CAM software, and iTero intra-oral scanners, has unveiled ClinCheck Live Plan, a new feature in its Invisalign digital dental treatment planning. articles.author: David Thomas

articles.title: Studio Ghibli and other Japanese publishers want OpenAI to stop training on their work
articles.summary: OpenAI's approach to working with copyrighted content is to ask forgiveness, not permission.
articles.content: OpenAI's approach to working with copyrighted content is to ask forgiveness, not permission.
articles.author: Amanda Silberling

articles.title: Altman and Nadella need more power for AI, but they’re not sure how much
articles.summary: The CEOs of OpenAI and Microsoft are betting that AI will continue to consume more electricity, but they're not sure how much.  That could leave some investors holding the bag.
articles.content: The CEOs of OpenAI and Microsoft are betting that AI will continue to consume more electricity, but they're not sure how much. That could leave some investors holding the bag.
articles.author: Tim De Chant

articles.title: Lambda inks multibillion-dollar AI infrastructure deal with Microsoft
articles.summary: This deal was announced just hours after Microsoft announced a $9. 7 billion deal with Australian data center company IREN.
articles.content: This deal was announced just hours after Microsoft announced a $9.7 billion deal with Australian data center company IREN.
articles.author: Rebecca Szkutak

articles.title: Dia’s AI browser starts adding Arc’s ‘greatest hits’ to its feature set
articles.summary: Dia's AI browser has a head start on what works for consumers thanks to learnings from its browser experiment, Arc.
articles.content: Dia's AI browser has a head start on what works for consumers thanks to learnings from its browser experiment, Arc.

articles.title: OpenAI spreads $600B cloud AI bet across AWS, Oracle, Microsoft
articles.summary: OpenAI is on a spending spree to secure its AI compute supply chain, signing a new deal with AWS as part of its multi-cloud strategy.  The company recently ended its exclusive cloud-computing partners.
articles.content: OpenAI is on a spending spree to secure its AI compute supply chain, signing a new deal with AWS as part of its multi-cloud strategy. The company recently ended its exclusive cloud-computing partnership with Microsoft. It has since allocated a reported $250 billion back to Microsoft, $300 billion to
articles.author: Ryan Daws

articles.title: AI browsers are a significant security threat
articles.summary: Among the explosion of AI systems, AI web browsers such as Fellou and Comet from Perplexity have begun to make appearances on the corporate desktop.  Such applications are described as the next evolut.
articles.content: Among the explosion of AI systems, AI web browsers such as Fellou and Comet from Perplexity have begun to make appearances on the corporate desktop. Such applications are described as the next evolution of the humble browser, and come with AI features built in; they can read and summarise web pages
articles.author: AI News

articles.title: OpenAI and Amazon ink $38B cloud computing deal
articles.summary: OpenAI isn't done securing the AI infrastructure it needs to rapidly scale agentic workloads.  The ChatGPT maker on Monday said it has reached a deal with Amazon to buy $38 billion in cloud computing .
articles.content: OpenAI isn't done securing the AI infrastructure it needs to rapidly scale agentic workloads. The ChatGPT maker on Monday said it has reached a deal with Amazon to buy $38 billion in cloud computing services over the next seven years.
articles.author: Rebecca Bellan

articles.title: Microsoft’s $15.2B UAE investment turns Gulf State into test case for US AI diplomacy
articles.summary: For the first time, the U.  has granted Microsoft a license to export Nvidia chips to the UAE — a move that positions the country as both a proving ground for U.
articles.content: For the first time, the U.S. has granted Microsoft a license to export Nvidia chips to the UAE — a move that positions the country as both a proving ground for U.S. export-control diplomacy and a regional anchor of American AI influence.
articles.author: Rebecca Bellan

articles.title: Microsoft inks $9.7B deal with Australia’s IREN for AI cloud capacity
articles.summary: The deal will give Microsoft access to compute infrastructure built with Nvidia's GB300 GPUs, which will be deployed over phases through 2026.
articles.content: The deal will give Microsoft access to compute infrastructure built with Nvidia's GB300 GPUs, which will be deployed over phases through 2026.
articles.author: Ram Iyer
